thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Billions of Dollars Pour Into Tech Funds, Powering Stock-Market Gains

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: Billions of Dollars Pour Into Tech Funds, Powering Stock-Market Gains
text:
Investors are increasing their bets on shares of technology companies, renewing concerns that the market is becoming too dependent on a few big stocks to power its gains.
Nearly $5 billion has poured into tech-focused stock funds so far this year, the most of any major sector, according to Thomson Reuters Lipper data. That figure represents nearly half of what the group pulled in for all of 2017. In January alone, tech funds received $3.9 billion in inflows, the most in a single month for such funds since March 2000â€”the peak... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
